desc: Shep's Wool Offers the Finest Wool Roving for all your Spinning into Yarn, Wet Felting and Needle Felting Needs. We also offer the Best Handmade Chunky Knit Blankets in USA! Wool Dryer Balls for Natural Laundry Care and Wholesale!

layout.text:
Providing High Quality Wool Roving at the
Best Price is our Passion!
